text: Patrick J. Scanlon (December 29, 1861 – July 17, 1913) was a Major League Baseball outfielder. He played for the 1884 Boston Reds in the Union Association. ==Sources== Category:Major League Baseball outfielders Category:Boston Reds (UA) players Category:Baseball players from Massachusetts Category:19th-century baseball players Category:Holyoke (minor league baseball) players Category:1861 births Category:1913 deaths Category:Baseball people from Nova Scotia Category:Sportspeople from Halifax, Nova Scotia
title: Pat Scanlon (outfielder)
